metadata.title: CVE-2023-46728 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Squid is a caching proxy for the Web supporting HTTP, HTTPS, FTP, and more.Due to a NULL pointer dereference bug Squid is vulnerable to a Denial ofService attack against Squid's Gopher gateway. The gopher protocol isalways available and enabled in Squid prior to Squid 6.0.1. Responsestriggering this bug are possible to be received from any gopher server,even those without malicious intent. Gopher support has been removed inSquid version 6.0.1. Users are advised to upgrade. Users unable to upgradeshould reject all gopher URL requests.

criterions.comment: squid3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
